item.title: I cant seem to find this error
item.dc:creator: @Can Can
item.description:
@Can wrote:

Yes Ron,. But thats not were the problems started. If you read the line over the script you understand that I only posted the script to show that i had installed SRL properly, to avoid people telling me that i probably just had installed/set-up srl wrong. Anyway everything is good now Sorry for any missunderstandings.

item.title: I cant seem to find this error
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

But according to your code, SetupSRL was declared first…

Begin SetupSRL; FindNormalRandoms; end.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant seem to find this error

item.title: I cant seem to find this error
item.dc:creator: @Can Can
item.description:
@Can wrote:

It is probably many different causes to create this error.
But i found out that one of the reasons are if you declare " SetUpSRL; " after you have called upon rsl functions such as FindNormalRandoms;. As it seems that SetUpSRL needs to be declared first

Read full topic

item.title: I cant seem to find this error
item.dc:creator: @Can Can
item.description:
@Can wrote:

hmm, whats the problem with the SRL include?

[Runtime Error] : Exception: Access violation at address 0065154B in module ‘SCAR.EXE’. Read of address 00000000 in line 620 in script C:FILESSCARincludessrlsrlcoreText.scar

My SRL is seemingly correct installed, as i can run this without problems.
Program New;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

Begin
SetupSRL;
FindNormalRandoms;
end.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 08:56:52 AM[/size][hr]
Heheheh, Never mind folks. Classic beginner flaw. I managed to fix it

Read full topic
